name: Haunt Your Ex
description:
You're dead. That's a shame. Fortunately, there's one upside: you now have the opportunity to Haunt Your Ex!

Controls: Use the Down cursor key (or swipe down on mobile).

---

A short game made for 1-Bit Jam.

Restrictions:

1. Must be 1-bit (i.e. monochromatic/black and white)

2. Must use one-button controls (Only uses the Down key, although you can technically go up too if you want!)

Made in Bitsy.
